summary: A mysterious stranger appears to take terrifying revenge on former Confederate officers who during the Civil War betrayed and were responsible for the massacre of their unit.
cast: Anthony Steffen|Paolo Gozlino|Luciano Rossi|Teodoro Corrà|Jean Louis|Carlo Gaddi|Victoriano Gazzarra|Thomas Rudy|Lucia Bomez|Emy Rossi Scotti|Rada Rassimov|Artemio Antonini|Ettore Arena|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|Ennio Balbo|Omero Capanna|Remo Capitani|Angelo Casadei|Arnaldo Dell'Acqua|Alberigo Donadeo|Celso Faria|Marcello Meconizzi|Furio Meniconi|Emilio Messina|Osiride Pevarello|Renzo Pevarello|Claudio Ruffini|Sandro Scarchilli|Angelo Susani|Pietro Torrisi|Franco Ukmar|Sergio Ukmar
title: Django el bastardo
